title: Flutter Development Intern
description: 6-month internship for Flutter developers. You'll work on real projects and learn from our senior developers.
eligibility: B.Tech/B.E. Computer Science students in 3rd/4th year

title: Data Science Intern
description: Learn data analysis and machine learning while working on real-world datasets.
eligibility: M.Sc/B.Tech in Data Science or related field

title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Internship opportunity for creative designers to work on mobile and web interfaces.
eligibility: Design students with basic knowledge of Figma/Adobe XD

title: Backend Development Intern
description: Learn Node.js and MongoDB while building real backend services.
eligibility: Computer Science students with basic programming knowledge

title: DevOps Intern
description: Hands-on experience with AWS, Docker and Kubernetes in a production environment.
